Title: EU LNG imports in March set to rise by 5% from February amid increased FSRU utilisation
Description: LNG imports into the European Union are set to rise in March both compared to the previous month and the previous year, with increasing volumes delivered to the bloc’s new FSRUs as the facilities ramp up their utilisation. LNG remains the main replacement for the lost pipeline supplies from Russia which used to be the EU’s top supplier prior to last year.
Author: DE

Title: France’s March LNG imports halved by strikes; but Europe's receipts rise
Description: France’s imports of LNG this month have fallen substantially against month- and year-earlier levels, thinned by almost four-week-long work stoppages at its four LNG receiving terminals due to industrial action.
Author: CK
